answers.author: Pooja Varma
answers.text:
Hi Megan,
I found a few documents that should prove useful. 
A study conducted by the Odessa, Texas, Fire Department on leasing Fire vehicles, including the advantages and disadvantages of owning vs. leasing. 
http://www.usfa.dhs.gov/pdf/efop/efo23696.pdf 
A proposal from Arlington County, Virginia, for leasing fire vehicles based on research conducted by the County’s Fire Department that assessed cots related to fleet ownership. 
http://www.usfa.dhs.gov/pdf/efop/efo25332.pdf 
Two articles discussing the process to determine whether to rent or buy fleet vehicles:
Navigating the Lease vs. Buy Maze   http://bit.ly/isNa6n 
Viewpoint: A quick fix for fleets   http://bit.ly/jYPgsk 
I hope this is helpful,
Pooja Varma
International City/County Management Association
Knowledge Network Intern
pvarma@icma.org

text:
Have any municipalities done an analysis of the benefits of owning v. leasing fleet vehicles, especially fire vehicles? I'm interested in beginning my own analysis for Chesterfield County and am looking for a good starting point. Any published resources on the subject would be appreciated as well.
Thanks!
title: Leasing fleet vehicles
